lines.text: This may sound like a foolish feminine question but why don't you help him?
I can't. He's doing it to himself.
Bend is just up ahead. That's where we might get the treatment.
Well if we do, remember there's no chickens in this coupe.
You know it's funny. There you are, laying there like a loser but yet you've got all the chips in front of you. You busted the game Leander.
